name: vol2surf
label: vol2surf: Map volumetric MRI images to fsaverage and FSLR surfaces
description: This gear maps volumetric time-series or R2 maps to surfaces. The gear uses freesurfer and python tools (ciftify) to make FS, gifti, and cifti surfaces. The gear can work with single images or archives

inputImageOrArchive.description: Single image or any zip archive. The gear can locate the image you want to process in a zip archive. Fmriprep archive can be used and multiple images can be processed. See the description for the imageName config for more details

zippedReconAll.description: Zipped recon-all output to map the images to. Used for making CIFTI maps. If not specified, ciftify stage is skipped. Required for custom surface mapping.

imageName.description: Name of the image you want to process in a zip or tar archive. This is implemented so that single images can be extracted from an archive. If your input is a single image and not an archive, enter NA here. Otherwise, enter the full name of the image including the file extention located in your archive that you want to process. The image can be located anywhere in your zip archive. This gear will find it. But make sure that you do not have two different images with the same name in your archive. If you have a zip archive containing a bunch of images that are not located in nested folders (should be in the first level), you can enter 'all' without the single quotes and the gear will process all of the images in there

outputDiagnosticForAllTasks.description: Output mapping diagnostics for all images. If false, mapping diagnostic images will be created for the first image only

saveCiftifyStructure.description: Saves the hcp file structure generated by ciftify.

FSsurfaceTemplate.description: Surface template that will be used for mapping. Any surface provided by freesurfer can be used here. Default: fsaverage.

author: Ozenc Taskin
